title: Hidden love: A friends to lovers romance
description: What happens when- You have feelings for your roommate- He also happens to be your best friendand to top all that,- You find yourself in a fake relationship with him?I guess I'm going to find out.My best friend Ian saves the day when my world turns upside down and I need a place to live in for a few months. It all starts out perfectly, but when an accident leads me to a fake relationship with my oh-so-hot best friend, things start to crumble and fake starts to feel too real. As the summer of Lappland turns into autumn and the house starts to reveal its secrets, we have to choose what's important to us - friendship or the possibility for something more.Hidden love is a slowburn HEA friends to lovers romance and a love story about bisexuality. It's a first in series but can be read as a stand-alone. Due to explicit content it's suitable for adult readers over 18 only.
author: Henna Vale
